long_description: Named after our own travel company, the REI Adventures pants offer quick-drying convenience and travel-savvy details that are a perfect match for outdoor lifestyles. Lightweight nylon fabric dries quickly to keep you comfortable while on the go; peached fabric has a soft, smooth feel. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Secure your travel essentials in the side-seam zippered pocket and the back right zippered pocket; front hand pockets and back left welt pocket provide additional storage. Left hand pocket also has a hidden zippered pocket inside; right hand pocket has an interior coin pocket. Hand pockets are constructed with bar tacks to prevent items from falling out while you're seated. Inseam gusset allows unrestricted range of motion. Backs of the leg openings are reinforced with webbing to increase abrasion resistance. The REI Adventures pants have a relaxed fit that generously allows for comfort and freedom of movement while you're traveling.
short_description: Named after our own travel company, the REI Adventures pants offer quick-drying convenience and travel-savvy details that are a perfect match for outdoor lifestyles.
